disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

disableParam_Debug.Wiki: Parameters marked with a circle are excluded from all packages (because they are for debugging).

PlayMapId.Wiki: Please enter the map number to be played back as an 8-digit number. This is the map number used as the reference in the cutscene. If you do not specify the correct map number, the playback position will shift.

RequireMapId0.Wiki: Please enter the map number required for display as an 8-digit number. This parameter is used by the guest as a list to determine if the cutscene can be played. If you don't need it, you can leave it as 0 or blank.

RequireMapId1.Wiki: Please enter the map number required for display as an 8-digit number. This parameter is used by the guest as a list to determine if the cutscene can be played. If you don't need it, you can leave it as 0 or blank.

RequireMapId2.Wiki: Please enter the map number required for display as an 8-digit number. This parameter is used by the guest as a list to determine if the cutscene can be played. If you don't need it, you can leave it as 0 or blank.

RefCamPosHitPartsID.AltName: Hit Part ID for Reference Camera
RefCamPosHitPartsID.Wiki: Hit part ID for calculating camera position during loading

ClientDisableViewTimeForProgress.AltName: Client Load View - Progress Bar Time
ClientDisableViewTimeForProgress.Wiki: The number of seconds used to display the progress of the loading screen progress bar that is displayed when the guest side cannot play in the multi. [GR] SEQ22843 [Cutscene] Players who have not read the map number required for display during cutscene playback will see the screen go dark.

HitParts_0.Wiki: Hit parts waiting to be read 0

HitParts_1.Wiki: Hit parts waiting to be read 1
